org.hibernate.search.backend.impl.lucene.LuceneBackendResources

    org.hibernate.search.backend.impl.lucene  

    • Uses of LuceneBackendResources in org.hibernate.search.backend.impl.lucene

      Methods in org.hibernate.search.backend.impl.lucene that return LuceneBackendResources 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LuceneBackendResources LuceneBackendQueueProcessor.getIndexResources() 
      LuceneBackendResources LuceneBackendResources.onTheFlyRebuild()
      Creates a replacement for this same LuceneBackendResources: reuses the existing locks and executors (which can't be reconfigured on the fly), reuses the same Workspace and ErrorHandler, but will use a new LuceneWorkVisitor.
